channel.title: RAGE Tool Kit to Release Today. 2 Feb. 2013
channel.description:
The guys over at id Software are planning to release their dev kit for RAGE today on Steam. According to the Bethesda blog, the kit is a hefty 35gb large and will be available later today.
[url]https://www.bethblog.com/2013/02/08/rage-tool-kit-available-today-on-steam/[/url]
Now, I'm not sure if this is just a barebones modding kit or what, but I'm one of those few people who supports id Tech 5 and who thought that RAGE was a beautiful game, so I'm hoping this tool will show people what else id Tech 5 can do and that it's not 100% deserving of the bad rep it gets.

item.title: RAGE Tool Kit to Release Today. 2 Feb. 2013
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
God, I WISH Rockstar would release a Rockstar Advanced Game Engine toolkit. That would be a superpowerful tool in the hands of modders.

Read full topic
item.source: RAGE Tool Kit to Release Today. 2 Feb. 2013

item.title: RAGE Tool Kit to Release Today. 2 Feb. 2013
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I thought you meant the toolkit for Rockstar’s RAGE engine. Not as excited now but still pretty excited.

Read full topic
item.source: RAGE Tool Kit to Release Today. 2 Feb. 2013
